◆ metal_xlnx_irq_init()

int metal_xlnx_irq_init ( void  )

metal_xlnx_irq_int

Xilinx interrupt controller initialization. It will initialize the metal Xilinx IRQ controller data structure.

Returns
0 for success, or negative value for failure
